name: Zombai
description:
Description

Zombai is an 2D action RPG game where a father and daughter went camping but the plan turned into a zombie apocalypse disaster. The player as the father went to the forest filled with hordes of zombies on a mission to search his daughter.

Controls

  • [LMB] - Shoot
  • [W] = Move Up; [A] = Move Left; [S] = Move Down; [D] = Move Right
  • [E] - Pick Up or Buy
  • [Shift] - Switch Weapon
